title: my pbe account is inactive and i cant get help.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, account sharing of **any kind** is against the [*Terms of Use*](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse), so we won't be able to assist you in gaining access to his PBE account.

You can signup for your own PBE account from [this link](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe), though.

Let me know if you have any questions.
wait so him leaving me his account is not acceptable?
Correct, that is a form of **account sharing.**
